content: 2 and all even rnds knit round 3 *k5 k2tog repeat from *around round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from *around round 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from *around round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from *around round 11 *k1 k2tog repeat from *around round 12 *k2tog repeat from *around draw yarn through remaining stitches pull tight and secure weave in ends block lightly tips alp natural is a novelty yarn made up of multiple different yarns and ribbons the transitions are a feature on the body of the hat but the ribbing needs to be soft and flexible make sure to start from the beginning of a section of soft stretchy yarn especially if you re working with the remaining yarn from another project because having a yarn change in the middle of the ribbing may not look good and/or affect the stretchiness when winding the yarn from the skein watch for the yarn you want for the ribbing then cut the yarn there and start a new ball it s hand-knotted so you can just tie the first ball to the end of the second when it runs out
